awards.description: The aim of the current mobility program is to set up a strong and fruitful collaboration with the University Gadjah Mada (Yogyakarta, Indonesia), with a research project on cross-cultural clinical psychology and teaching within the field of experimental and clinical psychology.

awards.title: Article Award

profile_positions.title: Bestuurslid, portefeuillehouder congres

profile_positions.description:
My research focuses on anxiety disorders and posttraumatic stress disorder (PTSD).

With my research I try to understand why some people develop PTSD after a traumatic event, while others recover naturally from such an experience. Furthermore, I'm interested in the mechanisms through which risk factors contribute to the onset or maintenance of anxiety.

In my current work, I aim to gain insight in the factors that influence the onset, maintenance, and treatment of PTSD and anxiety disorders.
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Researcher
